overview: William Shakespeareâ€™s HAMLET as a Rock Opera. William Shakespeare completed his HAMLET in 1602. It became the most performed play in the world. At least 26 operas have been written based on Hamlet. However, there were only few attempts to put the original words by Shakespeare into music. The most known one was created by Ambroise Thomas in the French language in 1868.
title: Hamlet in Rock
